summary: Missing type for Location.prototype.replace in ie_dom.js

comments.content:
The Location.prototype.replace method in ie_dom.js has no type information (And it looks like all the other stuff of Location.prototype is incomplete as well). So when compiling code like 

  window.location.replace("someUrl")

ends in a compiler warning:

   ERROR - could not determine the type of this expression
      window.location.replace("someUrl");

A workaround is casting the replace method to the correct type:

  (/** @type {function(string)} */ window.location.replace)("someUrl");

To fix this the type must be put into the ie_dom.js file. And maybe it is a good idea to add the missing types to all other members there as well.
This issue was closed by revision r788.

FYI:

This was rolled back due to breakage. Everything is fixed, and currently running tests.
This issue was closed by revision r792.
